news.content:
üëÄ TF Grid 3.0 mainnet is almost there!


Update: Mainnet has been launched yesterday, almost no capacity yet https://explorerv3.grid.tf/ but some farmers will add over next days. We expect to have much more in 1 week.


No big announcements yet, this is all close community news for now. üôè
news.excerpt: TF Grid 3 Mainnet has been launched with limited capacity! Just close community news, for now.
